NIHSlcms 0.0.0.9003

Read metadata

lcms_meta_read.Rd

Reads metadata from an Excel file.

lcms_meta_read(xlsx_file)

Arguments

xlsx_file

xlsx_file "The .xlsx excel file" with metadata.

Value

A dataframe with the metadata.

See also

Other metadata functions: lcms_meta_add, lcms_meta_export, phData

Other import/export functions: lcms_convert_ipo_to_xcms, lcms_dataset_load, lcms_dataset_save, lcms_identify_metabolites, lcms_meta_export, lcms_peak_annotation, lcms_raw_data, lcms_read_ipo_to_xcms, lcms_read_samples, lcms_rearrange_datafiles_by_class, lcms_sig_peaks_table, lcms_spectral_sig_features, lcms_to_mait, lcms_write_opt_params, lcms_write_parameter_table, phData

Examples

metadata <- lcms_meta_read(system.file("extdata",
                                             "metadata.xlsx",
                                              package = "NIHSlcms"))
#> New names:
#> * `Protocol REF` -> `Protocol REF...3`
#> * `Protocol REF` -> `Protocol REF...7`
#> * `Term Source REF` -> `Term Source REF...9`
#> * `Term Accession Number` -> `Term Accession Number...10`
#> * `Term Source REF` -> `Term Source REF...15`
#> * ... and 14 more problems
print(metadata[1:6])
#> # A tibble: 8 x 6
#>   `Sample Name` sampleNames `Protocol REF..~ `Parameter Valu~ `Parameter Valu~
#>   <chr>         <chr>       <chr>            <chr>            <chr>           
#> 1 MRC_Run1_10u~ MRC_Run1_1~ Extraction       N/A              none            
#> 2 MRC_Run1_10u~ MRC_Run1_1~ Extraction       N/A              none            
#> 3 MRC_Run1_10u~ MRC_Run1_1~ Extraction       N/A              none            
#> 4 MRC_Run1_10u~ MRC_Run1_1~ Extraction       N/A              none            
#> 5 MRC_Run1_10u~ MRC_Run1_1~ Extraction       N/A              none            
#> 6 MRC_Run1_10u~ MRC_Run1_1~ Extraction       N/A              none            
#> 7 MRC_Run1_10u~ MRC_Run1_1~ Extraction       N/A              none            
#> 8 MRC_Run1_10u~ MRC_Run1_1~ Extraction       N/A              none            
#> # ... with 1 more variable: `Extract Name` <chr>
